about_the_game:
Fill your futuristic battlefields with the armies of oppression! “Robot Rampage” introduces seven new and detailed enemies, with over 300 frames of animation between them, for use with Pixel Game Maker MV. Pit your gaming heroes up against mechanical soldiers, hovering gunships, chrome bloodhounds, riot-control tanks, heavy enforcers, pesky cybernetic “pixies,” and even man-sized metal locusts. With an army of machines at your command, unleash your robot rampage!

■ Round out your rogues’ gallery with seven new foes, each representing a different kind of challenge for the player to overcome.

■ Each enemy has two death animations to choose from. Let them go out in style, or just blow them apart — whichever suits your game best!

■ Smooth, detailed animations to help keep your game looking top-notch!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------


【Enemies and Projectiles (12 sprite sheets)】

- Soldier
- Soldier Projectile
- Centaur
- Centaur Projectile
- Tankdozer
- Tankdozer Main Projectile
- Tankdozer Secondary Projectile
- Gunship
- Gunship Projectile
- P1X1 (aka Techno Fairy)
- Wolf
- Locust
